record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, APRIL 26, 2007

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 9:15 a.m., Thursday, April 26; that on Thursday following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired, and the time for the two leaders reserved for their use later in the day, with a period of morning business until 10 a.m. with Senators permitted to speak therein; with the Senate proceeding to the conference report to accompany H.R. 1591, as provided for under a previous order.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
